item.title: Introduction to Python: Build Your First Bot With Selenium
item.description: Python holds a special place in my programming arsenal. Its simplicity and ease of use make it an ideal choice for a wide range of projects. While I wouldn't call myself a Python master, I've found it incredibly handy for quickly scripting tasks and building bots on the go. In this tutorial, I'll walk you through creating a Python bot using Selenium. If you're unfamiliar, Selenium is a powerful browser automation tool that's perfect for web scraping and testing.
